about_the_game:
Take on the role of commander and protect Earth from the relentless Drone invasion in this exciting tower defense game. Strategize and strengthen your defenses by utilizing a variety of towers, abilities, and elemental upgrades. It's up to you to lead the charge and save humanity from destruction.

Build


  • 16+ Towers to place all with their own upgrades.
  • Attack Towers deal maximum damage.
  • Utility Towers provide support such as cash boosts and perks to nearby Towers.

Use Powerful Abilities


Call in an airstrike, summon a snowstorm, or give towers temporary boosts to quickly turn the tide.

Harness The Elements


Place Towers in Elemental Zones and upgrade them to their ultra-powerful Fire, Ice, or Lightning variants.

Dominate in Conquest Mode


Manage resources and fight for vital strategic territories in the non-linear single-player mode!

  • Command epic battles against multiple enemy types
  • Defeat 'Boss Drones' and earn medals for each map
  • 30+ detailed maps to test your strategies on
  • Traditional Tower Defence gameplay plus the innovative Conquest mode
  • 3 difficulty levels to suit players of all abilities
  • Single-player offline gameplay means you don't need an internet connection to play!
